participant_1.background:
I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive.
my dad owns a appliance store that i do not want to inherit.
my grandson s favorite type of cake is chocolate.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
my favorite season is duck hunting season.

participant_2.background:
My recipe box is a collection of memories from my family.
I enjoy my own company and the challenge of archery.
My prized possession is my guitar, because it allows me to express my creativity and share my music with the world.
I trained hard to run a 5k and kept up my training all year.
i am learning to play the guitar.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to practice archery and play the guitar.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to play the guitar.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
Maybe I will take a lesson or two. I love music. Do you have any favorite songs?
I have a lot of favorite songs, but one of my favorites is "Stairway to Heaven" by Led Zeppelin. It's a classic for a reason!
I love that song too! I can listen to it over and over again.
Me too! It's one of those songs that never gets old.
What's your favorite thing about playing guitar?
I love being able to create music and share it with the world. It's so rewarding to be able to express myself through music.
That's awesome! I can't wait to start playing the guitar.
You're going to love it! It's a great way to relax and have fun.
Thanks for the encouragement! I think I'm going to start lessons next week.
That's great! I'm sure you're going to do great.
